document_notes.text:
This update for krb5 fixes the following security issue:

- CVE-2020-28196: Fixed an unbounded recursion via an ASN.1-encoded Kerberos message (bsc#1178512).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: MIT Kerberos 5 (aka krb5) before 1.17.2 and 1.18.x before 1.18.3 allows unbounded recursion via an ASN.1-encoded Kerberos message because the lib/krb5/asn.1/asn1_encode.c support for BER indefinite lengths lacks a recursion limit.
